name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Java Engineer with over 10 years of experience in crafting high-performance software solutions, specializing in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Microservices**. Adept at leveraging **AWS** for cloud deployment and management, with a proven track record of building scalable, secure systems. Strong experience in event-driven architectures utilizing technologies such as **Kafka**, and implementing RESTful APIs compliant with **OpenAPI** standards. Proven success in agile environments with a focus on **Scrum** methodologies to facilitate efficient project delivery. 
Alongside my core technical expertise, I possess a solid foundation in full-stack development with proficiency in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. My experience includes leading cross-functional teams to deliver enterprise solutions that integrate AI/ML capabilities for actionable insights and automation. Committed to developing maintainable applications in compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS, I am passionate about creating impactful software solutions that enhance user experiences.
